comment: general reaction (see R02213, R02838, R03326, R03784, R03849 and R04675)
definition: Steroid + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 21-Hydroxysteroid + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
name: steroid,NADPH-hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (21-hydroxylating)
